body: Like many of us, you may be concerned about the impact Climate Change is having on the planet. Governments anc corporations around the world are being urged to do more to reduce Carbon emissions in order to minimise the warming of our atmosphere.

But what are you personally doing to help? Are you aware of your impact on the environment around you? There are always changes we can make that can reduce the harm to our habitat, and collectively it can have a significant impact on the long-term health of the Earth.
